New Records: Chet Holmgren suffered a serious right hip injury during the game, forcing him to leave early and impacting the Thunder's performance
Key Match Events: Chet Holmgren's injury was a significant turning point in the game after he fell awkwardly and exited the game with limited mobility
Post-Match Reflections: Thunder coach Mark Daigneault expressed concern about Holmgren's injury and noted the team's adaptability in his absence
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Jalen Williams expressed concern for Holmgren and discussed the team's ability to handle the absence of key players
